channel.title: Drawing RuneScapes Hd Smog Sky
channel.description:
Hey guys Im going to show you how to load the hd sky in runescape All of this goes into Client.java
Declare this: [code]public boolean skyLoad = true;[/code]
Now Find This: [code]aClass25_946.method313(anInt858, anInt860, anInt862, anInt859, j, anInt861, false);[/code]
Above that^ add this: [code]if(skyLoad){ Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(334, 0, 0, 0xC8C0A8, 511, 0); }[/code]
This is what it will look like.(Ignore the combat boxes in the pic look at the sky) [IMG]http://i580.photobucket.com/albums/ss241/jeffey12345/combatboxes.jpg[/img]

item.title: Drawing RuneScapes Hd Smog Sky
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

Theres not really any fog. Just the color but its a good start.

Renamed:
Find

worldController.method313(xCameraPos, yCameraPos, xCameraCurve, zCameraPos, j, yCameraCurve);

Above it add

DrawingArea.method336(334, 0, 0, 0xC8C0A8, 511); // hd fog

Read full topic

Most have a -1 for the map ID so that would be more affective possibly.

item.title: Drawing RuneScapes Hd Smog Sky
item.dc:creator: @Tonic Tonic
item.description:
@Tonic wrote:

[quote=“Server-Unknown.Net, post:7, topic:288470”]Lol, I don’t know Java like a pro or anything but all I see was you changed the color:

0xC8C0A8 = Original sky color that you have
0xA7C5C7 = Sky Blue color that you can have

Basically you can look at a color wheel and get the color you want, and put 0x######, the #'s would be the color code such as A7C5C7 (0xA7C5C7), which would be sky blue color

[php]
if(skyLoad){
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(334, 0, 0, 0xC8C0A8, 511, 0);
}
[/php][/quote]

Ok, Wonderful

Read full topic

@Server-Unknown.Net wrote:

Lol, I don’t know Java like a pro or anything but all I see was you changed the color:

0xC8C0A8 = Original sky color that you have
0xA7C5C7 = Sky Blue color that you can have

Basically you can look at a color wheel and get the color you want, and put 0x######, the #'s would be the color code such as A7C5C7 (0xA7C5C7), which would be sky blue color

[php]
if(skyLoad){
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(334, 0, 0, 0xC8C0A8, 511, 0);
}
[/php]
